story.title: Solar Energy Experts in Ireland
paragraphs: At Solar Path, our mission is to lead the solar industry in Ireland by providing professional, expert, and honest advice to deliver sustainable, customer-focused solutions. We set new standards in reliability, environmental responsibility, and cleanliness, ensuring excellence at every stage.

Our vision is to be at the forefront of Ireland's renewable energy transformation by pioneering solar advancements and driving large-scale projects, while continually evolving to meet the energy needs of homes, businesses, and communities.

At Solar Path, our team's expertise and dedication drive our mission to create sustainable solar solutions. Led by co-founders Ken Hegarty and John Dennehy, our team brings together backgrounds in law, property development, and Internet technology to deliver the best solar PV installations in Cork and across Ireland.

items.title: Customer Focused
items.desc: We prioritise each customer's specific requirements, treating every home with the utmost care. Our approach ensures you get a customised solution that matches your energy needs.

items.title: Technical Excellence
items.desc: Certified commercial PV installers with extensive industry experience. Advanced system design for seamless integration, comprehensive maintenance and technical support.

items.desc: Detailed site assessments and energy analysis, bespoke solar power system designs, professional installations by accredited teams, and ongoing support with real-time system monitoring.
